title: Starring Miss Marple: A Murder is Announced / The Body in the Library / Murder With Mirrors
description: A collection of three Miss Marple novels by the inimitable Agatha Christie. It contains the following stories:1. "The Body in the Library,"2. "A Murder is Announced," and3. "Murder With Mirrors" (full title: "They Do It with Mirrors").Librarian's note: this entry is for the collection< "Starring Miss Marple." Entries of each of the twelve novels and twenty short stories in the Miss Marple series can be found elsewhere on Goodreads.
author: Agatha Christie
